notification.stockRequestStatusUpdated: Stock request status has been updated to *{{.RequestStatus}}*.
notification.newOrder: A new order has been placed by *{{.CustomerName}}*.
notification.storeWarehouseRunOut: The warehouse is running out of *{{.StockItem}}*.

notification.priceChange: The price of *{{.ProductName}}* has changed from *{{.OldPrice}}* to *{{.NewPrice}}*.

notification.newProductSize: A new size *{{.ProductSizeName}}*, *{{.Size}}* has been added for *{{.ProductName}}*.
